Public Delegate Sub StartupNextInstanceEventHandler(sender As Object, e As StartupNextInstanceEventArgs)
public delegate void StartupNextInstanceEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StartupNextInstanceEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.param: 包含事件数据的 对象。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在 Visual Basic 中，你不需要显式使用此委托。 有关详情，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance>。
## Examples <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.StartupNextInstance?displayProperty=nameWithType>
